content: cozy cabin blanket super bulky yarn 6 lion brand wool ease thick & quick 9 skeins us 15 10 mm needle guage 9 row and 9 sts = 1 square final blanket is approximately 40 x 54 cast on 96 stitches beginning garter stitch border row 1 10 knit all row to prepare for side borders it s best to place a marker after the first 6 stitches and another before the last 6 stitches row 11 knit across row 12 k6 purl to last 6 sts k6 caterpillar stitch section row 1 k6 *k1 p5* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 2 k6 *k5 p1* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 3 - 6 repeat row 1 & 2 row 7 k6 *p3 k1 p2* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 9 k6 *k2 p1 k3* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 10 - 13 repeat row 7 & 8 row 14 26 repeat row 1 13 row 27 knit all sts row 28 k6 purl to last 6 k6 seed stitch section row 1 k6 *k1 p1* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 2 k6 *p1 k1* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 3 10 repeat row 1 & 2 row 11 knit all sts cozy cabin blanket row 12 k6 purl to last 6 k6 ridge stitch section row 1 knit all sts row 2 k6 *k2tog* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 3 k6 *kfb* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 4 k6 purl to last 6 sts k6 row 5 12 repeat row 1 4 twice row 9 knit all sts row 10 k6 purl to last 6 sts k6 mesh stitch section row 1 k6 *yo p2tog* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 2 8 repeat row 1 row 9 knit all sts row 10 k6 purl to last 6 k6 moss stitch section row 1 k6 *k1 p1* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 2 k6 *k1 p1* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 3 k6 *p1 k1* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 4 k6 *p1 k1* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 5 8 repeat row 1 4 row 9 & 10 repeat row 1& 2 row 11 knit all sts row 12 k6 purl to last 6 k6 honeycomb section cozy cabin blanket row 1 k6 *slip 1 purlwise yarn in front yo p1* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 2 k6 *k1 yo slip 2 purlwise yarn at back * repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 3 k6 *slip 3 purlwise yarn at front
